description: The 25th anniversary revival of Miss Saigon has attracted an "incredibly young" audience, says theatre impresario Sir Cameron Mackintosh.

description: Prince Rupert Loewenstein, the Bavarian banker credited with turning the Rolling Stones into the world's richest rock band, has died at 80
